channel.title: [508] pvp random drops HELP
channel.description:
Hello And Thanks For Reading This!
Ok i have the random pk drop code already in my server but for some reason when you kill some one all you get is bones!
SOrry Im New To 508's! Any Help Would BE Awesome!
Thanks, Brandon
